Description: This spacious property offers both convenience and privacy.  The house is situated close to shopping and I-91 and is nestled back from the road and surrounded by trees. You will love the open floor plan that features a great room with a gorgeous fireplace.  The eat-in kitchen has natural wood cabinets, stainless appliances and a slider that leads outside to the deck.  The main level also has a formal dining room with hardwood floors and a half bath.    Upstairs you'll find a master bedroom suite a vaulted ceiling, large bathroom with a deep bathtub and stand up shower and a walk in closet.  There are 3 additional bedrooms upstairs, a shared bathroom and laundry.    The basement is partially finished with a heated bonus room that could function as a quiet home office or even a home gym.  There is plenty of room downstairs for storage and walk-out access to the backyard.    This house is meticulous inside and out with professional landscaping, freshly painted and newly installed carpets.

*Under Construction* Brand new home being built! 3 Bed room 2 full bath with  first floor having hardwood and a master bedroom, custom kitchen with granite cabinets, stainless steel appliances and deck access. second floor has 2 large bedrooms, full bathroom and lots of closet space. Basement is open and unfinished with a high efficiency gas on demand hot water/heat along with central air. The white final fence will continue across the back yard. Builder is open to add ons

Are you tired of paying some else's Mortgage? Why rent when you can own this affordable, carefree, Sun drenched home. At the Highlands on Westlake Community you can have the best of both worlds! Freshly painted with a neutral color palette, Open Floor plan featuring and updated kitchen with Granite counters, breakfast bar counter, recessed lighting, New Vinyl Plank flooring on first floor, Bathroom & Laundry area. New bath vanity w linen closet, new toilet & tile.3 bedrooms with ample closet space, + a versatile loft area can be a Den, Office, Gaming ,craft or Storage area. Laundry is located on 2nd floor. Spacious 2 car Attached garage, low maintenance exterior including Fenced in paver patio with a Hot Tub. Newer garage door opener This home has 2 sources of heat Seller has been using the energy efficient Kerosene as a primary source and the electric only as a secondary heat source, hot water heater fuel source is Kerosene. Close to many amenities and convenient access to major highways! This property is classified as a PUD with a low annual fee ($300) for Property management, snow removal and rubbish. This community has a kiddie playground and basketball court. Nothing to do but move in!! Showings start 4/28. (Please note the Hot Tub Wall Unit AC & Garage door opener are conveyed AS IS) Please use GHAR CONTRACTS

Enjoy convenient one level living with this Ranch that abuts Farm Hill Elementary School. Enter the spacious eat-in kitchen from the breezeway that also leads to the back deck and the attached garage. Off the kitchen is the dining room with slider out to the back deck perfect for entertaining and providing plenty of privacy. The dining room opens to the living room with large window allowing for lots of natural light. 2 spacious bedrooms and a full bath complete the main level. The lower level has 2 additional bedrooms recently added with new carpets and paint, and plenty of space for storage or to create more living space. Located in a great neighborhood close to everything!

Beautiful 3/4 Bedroom Split Colonial with remodeled kitchen and bathrooms!  The kitchen was remodeled last year and features beautiful grey cabinets, granite, subway tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances with gas stove, and modern ceramic plank flooring!  There are oak hardwood floors in bedrooms, hallway, living room and dining room.  The living room has a gas fireplace with blower that can heat most of the bedrooms as well.  The heated sunroom provides an additional family room/play room/office all year round!  In addition to the 2 car attached garage, there is a huge 3 car detached garage with loft, electricity, heat and engine lift....perfect for the car hobbyist and so many other purposes!  The yard is surrounded by trees providing great privacy...and don't forget the hot tub to relax in all 4 seasons!   Note: The family room could easily be used as an extra bedroom (as the previous owner did) if you are in need of 4 bedrooms.

What more could you ask for?  This home was the builders home so it has everything.  Wonderful open floor plan to entertain. Kitchen features granite, stainless appliances, induction cooktop, in wall oven and a large center island breakfast bar.  Hardwood floors throughout.  French doors open to a true Master bedroom suite offering a dual sided gas fireplace, sitting room or nursery, master bath with jacuzzi tub, double sinks, his/her walk-in closet. 5 bedrooms are on the second floor including second “‘master” with en-suite bath and walk in closet. Finished walk out lower level also has a gas FP, Great game room and exercise room which could also function as in-law with full bath and kitchenette.  Walk out to patio and level yard.  Energy conservation and going green in mind this home has Geothermal heat and hot water and Solar.  Oversized 3 car garage with 9 foot doors will accommodate any vehicle.  Large open level yard is opportunity for hobbies, games or relaxation

Looking for your own private oasis this summer during this pandemic? 95 Knoll Ridge Court is the property for you then! Pulling up to this 4000 SqFt propety located at the end of the cul-de-sac will really WOW you. On the exterrior of this well maintainted home is gorgeous light stoned brick with a three car attached garage. The best added feature is the backyard which has a heated salt water pool and gorgeous surrounding area for you and your family to enjoy this summer. Upon entering, you will find marble flooring all throughout the foyer to the kitchen. The main level includes a home office, living room, big kitchen, dining room, sun room and a family room with tall ceilings and gorgeous window light coming in. Upstairs you will find double doors into your master suite area with a huge walk in closet and big bathroom. An additonal 2 large bedrooms with a Jack and Jill bathroom and another bedroom with its own bathroom. Washer/Dryer is convetiently located upstairs with extra closet space. You cant go wrong with the space this home has to offer you. Conveniently located in between RT 9 and I-91 and within 10 minures from downtown Middletown Main St and Wesleyan Univsersity. Theres this home cant offer you - Come see it in person today!

If you're looking for privacy, this beautiful colonial tudor on 1.4 acres of land is a place for you. Close to Lyman Orchards Golf Club, Millers Pond State Park and Wesleyan University. 2658 sq ft of living space with hardwood floors throughout. Living room with a fireplace, 3 bedrooms upstairs, 2 full bathrooms and jetted tub in the grand master suite. Spacious kitchen with dining area comes with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Large formal dining room has a walkout to backyard and a gorgeous patio - perfect for summer cookouts and entertaining guests. Above ground saltwater pool is an ideal place to relax. A partially finished basement adds ~600sqf of usable space. Large 2 car attached garage has enough space for extra storage.  This house is a must see!

Two story brick house all updated and ready to move in... New roof,  new windows, freshly painted, new bathrooms, new floors, and new furnace.  Amazing location in the heart of Middletown, close to hospital and bus lines. Just needs new owners! Shared driveway, has 3 parking spaces.

Welcome to this move-in ready colonial farmhouse in vibrant Middletown! If you are looking for the charm of an older home with the amenities and upgrades of a newer one, this home is the perfect match. The open kitchen is stunning, with its center island, open shelving, and gas stove. Off the kitchen is the booth style dining room with a beautiful handcrafted table. Farther in, you'll find a cozy den with a spiral staircase, leading to a loft. Two relaxing sitting areas, a massive entryway, and a half bath complete the first floor. Upstairs is where you'll find the three bedrooms and two full baths. The luxuriously sized bonus room above the oversized two-car garage, provides endless possibilities! You'll be sure to entertain outside on the beautiful patio and level backyard. Solar panels (owned) will help you decrease your carbon footprint and your electric bill! Other updates to this home include a newer roof and a newer high-efficiency boiler.  A short walk or Uber to downtown is where you can enjoy the award winning restaurants and shops. Take a tour, today!

COZY, CHARMING HOME! MAKE THIS HOME SHINE AGAIN WITH SOME TLC. FEATURING TWO BEDROOMS; A BONUS DEN; LIVING ROOM WITH NATURAL LIGHT STREAMING IN; FIRST FLOOR LAUNDRY ROOM; STAINLESS APPLIANCES; AND THERMOPANE WINDOWS. CORNER LEVEL LOT.  CONVENIENT LOCATION! CLOSE TO MAJOR HIGHWAYS AND SHOPS.   PROPERTY TO BE SOLD AS IS!  SUBJECT TO THIRD PARTY APPROVAL. SHORT SALE

Town and Country Living! Located approximately 18 miles from Hartford this 3 bedroom 2 and a half bath newer construction colonial from 2009 boasts nearly 1,900 square feet of living space and will have you asking, "how soon can I move in"? Open concept with 9' ceilings, hardwood floors and lovely finishes all around complete this homes grace. Furnished with stainless steel appliances and finished with granite counters the kitchen provides plenty of cabinets and counter space for all epicurean adventurers. Head on out to the deck for some backyard barbecues and nighttime lounging by the fire pit or enjoy your morning coffee taking in the sun from the comfort of your front porch. The rest of your journey will talk you to the top of the stairs where you'll find a second floor laundry room and separate bathroom which services 2 of the bedrooms. The Master bedroom gleams a walk-in closet, bathroom with double sinks and a marble vanity. Don't forget the massive unfinished walkout basement with high ceilings perfect for storage, a finished playroom, home office, entertainment space, etc. Finally downtown Middletown is situated along the banks of the Connecticut River and offers a wide range of activities. It's the perfect place to play, work, shop and be entertained. Easily accessible to I-91, Route 9 and the Merritt Parkway, Wesleyan University, Wadsworh Falls State Park, Kid City Children's Museum, and Van Vleck Observatory.

Coming Soon. The gorgeous 4 bedroom brick colonial is move in ready. This large private home offers 4 large bedrooms with 3 on the second floor including a master suite complete with full bath including luxury shower including, steam, acupuncture, rainfall and Bluetooth so you can listen to your favorite music while relaxing in the jet tub. There is a fourth bedroom on the first floor and a full bath. The main floor offers a large living room with wood fireplace, plus a family room also with a fireplace. The large dining room is light and bright and ready for entertaining.  There is a large laundry room/mudroom on the main floor with plenty of storage place. The kitchen has plenty of counter space including a center island and a breakfast nook. Come make this your home today!  *** Additional South Fire Tax of  $1077.13 due annually not included in tax number. CLOSING TO BE SCHEDULED AFTER JULY 1st 2021

Welcome to lake life living! Located on a dead-end street, with year-round waterfront views and a private dock. 2nd floor bedroom features high ceilings and a large deck through sliding doors, facing the lake! Updates include a new roof, new deck and a new oil tank .. as well as a finished basement, 2 living rooms-which could be converted into a 2nd bedroom (hardwood floors under all the carpeting)! Don't miss an opportunity to own this adorable Cape!
3br/3ba split level beautifully updated with large wrap around deck, solar heating and so much more. Coming to the Market Saturday, May 1.

ONE OF A KIND! A mason's masterpiece! A large, eat-in kitchen features granite counter tops, and a custom glass-faced island as a centerpiece. The open concept living room has large windows that allow plenty of natural light, to show off the beautiful marble fireplace! A big, formal dining room is ready for years of memories! On the main level, you'll find a bonus room, that's perfect for a sitting room, office, or workout room! A 24'x20' giant master bedroom, with its custom en suite, boasting a jet tub and tiled shower, sits on the main level near to the full-sized designated laundry room, complete with built in cabinets. Upstairs, you'll find three more bedrooms, including a second master bedroom-type, with its own updated en suite and cathedral gazebo ceiling, and PLENTY of closet space. The basement is extremely clean, with tall ceilings and is perfect for storage, or is ready to be finished! It also features a wine cellar, and reinforced 'hideaway' room. The front porch is wrap around, and is made from the finest stone. Out back, you'll feel like you are in Italy; the patio is custom made with marble, hand cut pillars, and gorgeous stone. A fully functional stone pizza oven, benches, and multiple manicured sitting areas are an entertainers dream! Attached 2 car garage and shed for extra storage. Sitting on 3 full acres in South Farms, this is truly a GEM! You will not see another home with this exact meticulous detail! Schedule your private showing today! Agent related.

This property is perfect for the FHA buyer, house has appraised for close to $400.000. Bring your highest and best, owner is looking for over asking offers. Offers will be reviewed on Monday at noon.  Multi-generational living at it's best. Updated Kitchen with granite countertops and new appliances. Open floor concept which flows from the kitchen and dining room area towards the cozy living room ! There is a second living room with classical touches and a beautifully crafted fireplace. Home features five huge bedrooms and four updated bathrooms, this home has it all! Home is situated on three quarters of a acer. Don't waste any time and schedule your showing today! Please submit your highest and best offer.

A custom built estate that will have visitors and guests in "awe" as they pull up. Located at the end of a quiet cul-da-sac, this stunning modern colonial is the home of your dreams. Built in 2006, this home has it all! A professionally designed kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, a double-sided gas fireplace, two geothermal systems for heating, over-sized multipurpose room made for entertaining and more. A large master bedroom with a spacious walk in closet and master bathroom suite. An attached three bay garage easily fitting 6 vehicles with radiant floors. 50 year architectural roof! What more could you ask for? An incredible chance to own a rare one of a kind property!

A remarkable home in exceptional condition and location is ready for your downtown lifestyle. Take a moment to view this 3 level English Tudor within walking distance to the South Green and all of our downtown attractions and amenities. UNDER CONSTRUCTION. One floor living at its finest! This custom built house will blow you away! Over 2800 s/ft in the main living area with 3 bedroom, 2.5 baths, Master bedroom with amazing en suite, and a huge Great Room that's open to the kitchen and dining room.  If that's not enough, there's also an in-law apartment with its own separate entrance that has an additional bedroom with walk - in closet, full bath, living room, kitchen and laundry!  There's still time to pick your finishes! Enjoy the back yard with views of the reservoir and country style living all while being minutes away from all Middletown has to offer!

Imagine enjoying your morning beverage on the serene back deck, watching the sunrise, overlooking a private back yard with an amazing view!  That is what you will be able to do when you move into this 3,300+ home, with almost 1000 square feet of finished basement space,  Bedrooms, 3 Full baths, and 3-car garage. A traditional colonial floor plan provides an oversized living room with real woodburing fireplace, directly off the kitchen. The formal dining and a first floor bedroom and adjacent full bath round out the first floor. The upper level Master Suite includes a large, updated full Bath and finished attic space which would make for a great office, second large closet, or storage area. Three additional bedrooms and another full bath provide ample space for family or friends to visit. The finished basement area includes a half bath, plumbed for a tub or shower, kitchenette and family room area. The upgraded insulation in the walls ensure that the Central air, Propane for the basement gas fireplace, and oil heat run at peak efficiency to lower cooling and heating costs. There is a Hot-Tub as well as Generator Hookup.  Don't miss the convenient in-kitchen Central Vac feature that eliminates the need to sweep or use a dust pan!   This well-cared for home is on a private cul-de-sac road and is ready to be SOLD!
